All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel, java.lang.Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>, HasLayoutManager
public class FormDebugPanel
extends ScrollLayoutPanel

A panel that paints grid bounds if and only if the panel's layout manager is a ScrollFormLayout. You can tweak the debug paint process by setting a custom grid color.

This class is not intended to be extended. However, it is not marked as final to allow users to subclass it for debugging purposes.

Author:
Karsten Lentzsch, georgopoulos.georgios(at)gmail.com
See Also:
FormDebugUtils
